tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an overbite and wasn't sure whom to go to.Came across them on Google search with some really good ratings given by their satisfied patients,so I went.Met Dr srushti garg and she walked me through how the treatment was going to pan out.Got an appointment with Dr Deep garg,he articulated further and also helped me opt the appropriate treatment plan,I was willing to go for a more expensive plan but he advised me against it as it wasn't required for my set of teeth,hence saved me a lot of money.its been two months now and I'm already getting some positive feedback.Also they are very accessible and reaching them is not hard in case you want to.Also their timely reminder of the appointment help a lot.So far it's been great.All in all I'm satisfied and think I have made the right decision .I definitely recommend them
reply_text: Thanks for the kind feedback Rohan‚Ä¶ great patients make our job easy‚Ä¶

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am a frightened/ fearful / Jittery patient! I had a hole in my tooth which obviously had to be filled. I procastinated; because I was terrified. Haha. Then spoke with Dr. Deep Garg who assured me that I'l be fine. He, patiently through the treatment, kept explaining what he is doing and what I can expect as a result of each action : Tingling, Sharp Tingling, No feeling everything. "He cooperated with me more than I cooperated with him : hehe : yet again : my fear". And yes. Finally it is done. Thank you to this amazing Doctor who made this happen for me. And with almost no discomfort! I truly recommend Dr. Deep Garg to all; rest assured; treatment will be accurate and to the point.
reply_text:
Dentist Fear is common... Overcoming it is challenging... Good to know you took the challenge and overcame it!!!
Thanks for the kind feedback...
